pkgmetadata.longdescription: Root Mean Square Curvature Calculation // Calculates the RMS intrinsic and parameter-effects curvatures of a nonlinear regression model. The curvatures are global measures of assessing whether a model/data set combination is close-to- linear or not. See Bates and Watts (1980) doi:10.1002/9780470316757 and Ratkowsky and Reddy (2017) doi:10.1093/aesa/saw098 for details.
